org.zaproxy.zap.utils

Class TimeStampUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zaproxy.zap.utils.TimeStampUtils

  • public final class TimeStampUtils
extends Object
    Class to facilitate implementation of timestamps on various outputs
    Author:
    kingthorin+owaspzap@gmail.com

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String currentDefaultFormattedTimeStamp()
      Gets the current time stamp based on the DEFAULT format.
      static String currentFormattedTimeStamp(String format)
      Gets the current date/time based on the provided format which is a SimpleDateFormat string.
      static String getTimeStampedMessage(String message, String format)
      Returns the provided message along with a date/time based on the provided format which is a SimpleDateFormat string.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • currentDefaultFormattedTimeStamp

        public static String currentDefaultFormattedTimeStamp()
        Gets the current time stamp based on the DEFAULT format. The DEFAULT format is defined in Messages.properties.
        Returns:
        current formatted time stamp as String

      • currentFormattedTimeStamp

        public static String currentFormattedTimeStamp(String format)
        Gets the current date/time based on the provided format which is a SimpleDateFormat string. If application of the provided format fails a default format is used. The DEFAULT is defined in Messages.properties.
        Parameters:
        a - String representing the date format
        Returns:
        current formatted time stamp as String
        See Also:
        SimpleDateFormat

      • getTimeStampedMessage

        public static String getTimeStampedMessage(String message,
                           String format)
        Returns the provided message along with a date/time based on the provided format which is a SimpleDateFormat string. If application of the provided format fails a default format is used. The DEFAULT is defined in Messages.properties.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be time stamped
        the - format to be used in creating the time stamp
        Returns:
        a time stamp in the designated format along with the original message
        See Also:
        SimpleDateFormat
